title: Diamond Heart Leaf Pendant - Contemporary Mangalsutra Pendant
materials: GH color. Gold with Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A contemporary take on a traditional mangalsutra pendant. Features a delicate leaf and heart motif, with each 'leaf' and 'heart' paved with sparkling diamonds. The design is light and airy, perfect for modern wear. Suitable to be worn on various occasions.
occasions: and makes a thoughtful gift for your loved one.
description: A modern and elegant design that blends seamlessly with both traditional and western outfits. Features high-quality diamonds and crafted in 18K Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. This beautiful pendant is both elegant and eye-catching, making it a piece that will be treasured for years to come.
